text:
Thanks for the offer but I'm still trying to wrap my head around asyncio.

Would be good if sequential actions could be written one after the other. I've used callbacks to manage this in the past and it leads to confusion when I look at the code a few months down the line.

(I don't know whether or not asyncio will lead to race conditions either)

user_profile.real_name: Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon
user_profile.name: fcmisc
